name: Donald W. THOMAS, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Pennsylvania BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee

ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of December, 2005, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
